name: part_007
file: tmp_【#ちょこ先生誕2021】ちょこ先生の3Dお誕生日会【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [p9k8A3XzH68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Choco finishes the previous etude scene on a rooftop balcony with Mel's voiceover.
Choco and Mel discuss the previous 'Reverse Chocolate' etude and Choco's heart-thumping experience.
The duo introduces the final etude situation: 'Watching a Valentine Confession'.
Choco performs the 'Watching a Valentine Confession' etude, appearing in a school hallway with a romantic scenario playing out between cartoon figures.
Choco and Mel wrap up the segment and Choco shares her habit of getting caught during surprises.

subtitles.original: ホワイトデーで
subtitles.english: On White Day...

subtitles.original: 期待していてね
subtitles.english: ...please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: カーン！カーン！カーン！
subtitles.english: Clang! Clang! Clang!

subtitles.original: どうでした？どうでした？どうでした？
subtitles.english: How was it? How was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: どうだったかな～
subtitles.english: I wonder how it was...

subtitles.original: まさかのバレンタインデーに告白をされるっていうね
subtitles.english: I didn't expect to get confessed to on Valentine's Day.

subtitles.original: 逆チョコじゃん
subtitles.english: It was a "reverse chocolate" situation.

subtitles.original: いや、ちょっとガチ恋距離やばかったね、今
subtitles.english: Man, that "serious love distance" was insane just now.

subtitles.original: ね、ちょっとなんかドキドキしちゃうよ
subtitles.english: Right? It made my heart race a bit.

subtitles.original: もうメル様の声と合わさったらドキドキしちゃうよ、もう
subtitles.english: Combined with Mel-sama's voice, my heart was pounding!

subtitles.original: ちょっとメルもね、チョコ先生の動きを見てドキドキしてたけど
subtitles.english: Mel was also heart-thumping watching Choco-sensei's movements.

subtitles.original: ガチ？みんなもっとドキドキしてるんじゃないかな
subtitles.english: Really? I think everyone else's hearts are racing even more.

subtitles.original: これはどうかな、次で最後？
subtitles.english: I wonder... Is the next one the last?

subtitles.original: そうだね、次で最後になります
subtitles.english: That's right, the next one will be the last.

subtitles.original: もっとメル様と一緒にいたいんだけどな、チョコ
subtitles.english: Choco wants to be with Mel-sama more, though...

subtitles.original: でも今日は特別な日だから
subtitles.english: But today is a special day.

subtitles.original: わかった。終わったら二人でいようね
subtitles.english: Understood. Let's be together after this is over.

subtitles.original: わかった、頑張る
subtitles.english: Okay, I'll do my best!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、次のシチュエーション、シチュエーション3！
subtitles.english: Well then, the next situation, situation 3!

subtitles.original: ラスト！ラスト！ラスト！
subtitles.english: The last! The last! The last!

subtitles.original: テレン！「バレンタインに告白を見守る」シチュエーションです
subtitles.english: Ta-da! It's the "Watching a Valentine confession" situation.

subtitles.original: です！見守る... 見守る？
subtitles.english: Yes! Watching... watching?

subtitles.original: なるほど、覗いてんの？
subtitles.english: I see, so you're peeping?

subtitles.original: ガチ？
subtitles.english: Seriously?

subtitles.original: 見守るでも色んなシチュエーションがあるからね
subtitles.english: Well, "watching" can mean many different things.

subtitles.original: あ、こういう感じなのね、オッケーオッケー
subtitles.english: Ah, so it's like this. Okay, okay.

subtitles.original: 準備はいいですか？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: 任せてほしい
subtitles.english: Leave it to me.

subtitles.original: よし、じゃあ告白を見守るチョコ先生まで
subtitles.english: Alright, then, "Choco-sensei watching a confession" in...

subtitles.original: カーン！
subtitles.english: Clang!

subtitles.original: よいしょ... よいしょ...
subtitles.english: Heave-ho... heave-ho...

subtitles.original: あらあら、まあまあ。あそこにいるのは金髪のエルフ？
subtitles.english: My, my. Is that a blonde elf over there?

subtitles.original: と、銀髪の騎士？
subtitles.english: And a silver-haired knight?

subtitles.original: お、女子高生が二人いるわね
subtitles.english: Oh, there are two high school students.

subtitles.original: もう、何してるのかしら
subtitles.english: Gosh, I wonder what they're doing.

subtitles.original: もう少し近づいてみましょう
subtitles.english: Let's get a bit closer.

subtitles.original: よいしょ...
subtitles.english: Heave-ho...

subtitles.original: あれはチョコレートかしら
subtitles.english: Is that... chocolate?

subtitles.original: あっそっか、今日はバレンタインデーだものね
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right. Today is Valentine's Day.

subtitles.original: 待って、あれは友チョコなの？それとも本命チョコ？
subtitles.english: Wait, is that "friendship chocolate" or "true love chocolate"?

subtitles.original: どっちなの？
subtitles.english: Which is it?

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って、会話が聞き取れないじゃない
subtitles.english: Hold on, I can't hear their conversation.

subtitles.original: もっともっと近づかなきゃ
subtitles.english: I have to get closer and closer.

subtitles.original: バレないように...
subtitles.english: So I don't get caught...

subtitles.original: そーっと... そーっと...
subtitles.english: Stealthily... stealthily...

subtitles.original: ドッカーン！
subtitles.english: Kaboom!

subtitles.original: あ、バレた... バレてないよね？
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm spotted... No, I'm not, right?

subtitles.original: でももう、もどかしいわね。早くチョコレート渡しなさいよ！
subtitles.english: But gosh, this is so frustrating. Just give him the chocolate already!

subtitles.original: もう！そこの二人！
subtitles.english: Geez! You two over there!

subtitles.original: どう考えても両想いなんだから、さっさとお互いのチョコレート、交換しなさい！
subtitles.english: It's obvious you both like each other, so just exchange your chocolates already!
Ah...

subtitles.original: やべ、バレちゃった
subtitles.english: Oops, I got caught.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、皆様いかがだったでしょうか
subtitles.english: So, there you have it. Everyone, how was that?

subtitles.original: いや、めちゃおもろいな、この企画
subtitles.english: Man, this segment is super funny.

subtitles.original: なんかチョコ先生らしかったね、ちょっと
subtitles.english: That was very "Choco-sensei-like," wasn't it?

subtitles.original: ガチ？
subtitles.english: Really?

subtitles.original: うん、いやでもわかる。チョコもよくサプライズしようと思ってやるんだけど、結構バレること多い
subtitles.english: Yeah. I get it. Choco often tries to do surprises, but I get caught pretty often.

subtitles.original: そうなの？
subtitles.english: Is that so?

subtitles.original: 「聞こえない聞こえない」と思って、なんか準備してるじゃん
subtitles.english: Like, I'm thinking "they can't hear me," and I'm preparing something...

subtitles.original: もう準備し終わって、いつ出ていこうかなってタイミングを見計らうのよ
subtitles.english: I've finished preparing, and I'm just waiting for the right moment to come out.

subtitles.original: タイミング見計らおうと思ってドア開けようとした瞬間に、そのサプライズ相手がドア開けちゃって、「あ... バレちゃった」みたいな
subtitles.english: And just as I'm about to open the door to time it perfectly, the target of the surprise opens it first. "Ah... I'm caught."

subtitles.original: こと多い、結構
subtitles.english: That happens quite a lot, actually.

subtitles.original: そっか、バレても嬉しいもんね
subtitles.english: I see. Well, it's still nice even if you get caught.

subtitles.original: そう、嬉しい。でもね、メル様とね...
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's nice. But you know, with Mel-sama...
